Title: Requires certain political communications to include provenance data for all audio, images or videos used in such communications
Summary: Requires certain political communications to include provenance data for all audios, images or videos used in such communications; provides for the repeal of certain provisions upon the expiration thereof.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to requiring certain political communications to include provenance data for all audio, images or videos used in such communications; and providing for the repeal of certain provisions upon the expiration thereof
